title: Todd Gurley gets paid, Jason La Canfora on Ravens QB, inside Bills draft (Football 07/25)
description:
Jason La Canfora joins Will Brinson to break down the latest news and notes in the NFL, including the Julio Jones holdout, the Josh Gordon situation, what he saw from Joe Flacco and Lamar Jackson at Ravens training camp, the story behind the Bills draft after speaking with GM Brandon Beane and why Sean Payton had to go up and get Marcus Davenport. Will also breaks down the Todd Gurley contract and what it means for other big-name running backs as well as the future of the franchise tag and Aaron Donald.
